omfortable or distressed. Whatever reasons we may have
for preserving or protecting non-sentient beings, these reasons do not refer to
their own interests. For without conscious awareness, beings cannot have inter-
ests. Without interests, they cannot have a welfare of their own. Without a
welfare of their own, nothing can be done for their sake. Hence, they lack moral
standing or status.
